text: Hopea exalata is a species of tree in the family Dipterocarpaceae. It is endemic to Hainan Island in southern China and enjoys second-class national protection. Some authors consider H. exalata as a junior synonym of Hopea reticulata that is also known from Vietnam. ==References== Category:Trees of China Category:Endemic flora of China exalata Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Hopea exalata
